   "source": [
    "---\n",
    "title: \"NYCTaxi\"\n",
    "author: \"최규빈(2021-43052)\"\n",
    "format: dashboard\n",
    "execute: \n",
    "  enabled: true\n",
    "  cache: false\n",
    "  freeze: false\n",
    "---\n",
    "\n",
    "```{python}\n",
    "#| output: false\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import plotly.express as px\n",
    "import plotly.io as pio\n",
    "\n",
    "pd.options.plotting.backend = \"plotly\"\n",
    "pio.templates.default = \"plotly_white\"\n",
    "\n",
    "nyc_landmarks = {\n",
    "    \"Name\": [\"Wall Street\", \"Midtown Manhattan\", \"Times Square\", \n",
    "             \"Central Park\", \"Statue of Liberty\", \"Forest Park\", \"Citi Field\"],\n",
    "    \"Latitude\": [40.7074, 40.7549, 40.7580, 40.785091, 40.6892, 40.7028, 40.7571],\n",
    "    \"Longitude\": [-74.0113, -73.9840, -73.9855, -73.968285, -74.0445, -73.8495, -73.8458]\n",
    "}\n",
    "\n",
    "df_nyc_landmarks = pd.DataFrame(nyc_landmarks)\n",
    "\n",
    "fig1 = px.scatter_mapbox(\n",
    "    data_frame = df_nyc_landmarks,\n",
    "    lat = 'Latitude',\n",
    "    lon = 'Longitude',\n",
    "    hover_data = 'Name',\n",
    "    #---#\n",
    "    mapbox_style = 'carto-positron',\n",
    "    zoom=10,\n",
    "    width=750,\n",
    "    height=600\n",
    ")\n",
    "fig1.update_traces(\n",
    "    marker = {\n",
    "        'size':15, \n",
    "        'color': 'red', \n",
    "        'opacity':0.5\n",
    "    }\n",
    ")\n",
    "# 1-(1),(2),(3) 에 대응하는 plotly figure를 아래와 같은 이름으로 저장\n",
    "# fig3 = ...\n",
    "```\n",
    "\n",
    "```{python}\n",
    "#| title: 속력별 경로 시각화\n",
    "fig1.show(config={'scrollZoom':False})\n",
    "```"
   ]
  }
